author: FractalDataWorks Framework
name: FractalDataWorks Enhanced Enum Option
description: Creates a new concrete option for an existing FractalDataWorks Enhanced Enum

OptionName.description: The name of the new Enhanced Enum option (e.g., Pending, Completed, Cancelled)

TemplateNamespace.description: The namespace for the Enhanced Enum option

OptionId.description: The unique ID for this option (make sure it's unique within your Enhanced Enum)

BaseClassName.description: The name of the Enhanced Enum base class (e.g., StatusBase, PriorityBase)

DisplayName.description: The display name for this option

Description.description: Description of what this option represents

SortOrder.description: Sort order for displaying this option

IsActiveByDefault.description: Whether this option should be active by default
